nodes.text: Void Imports was a black market shop in Point Nadir. It was run by Ferrika Lazerra and was located in a beat-up duraplast habitation unit that looked like it was from a first-contact colony.

Due to Ferrika's extensive smuggling and black market contacts, almost anything could be purchased given enough time and credits. She paid kickbacks to the Anjiliac clan and Epsis but kept a pair of Rodian gunslingers as guards just in case.
